name: Snackimalz!
description: Snackimalz! is a classic match-three game, styled in cute and kawaii aesthetics.  Players can spend points earned from their matches on a gacha machine, that can gift them with wonderful rewards! This addictive game with no real-life consequences was created in less than 2 weeks by Michaela Bussey, Nikiel Gopichand and Declan Thompson as a third year game design project.
